title: Zen Bento
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Japanese, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Simple menu based around teriyaki rice bowls. Made to order bento bowl; includes one veggie bento and one organic tofu bento, both of which are vegan suitable when you ask for vegan sauce (some of the sauces contain honey, so ask). Brown rice or noodles can be substituted for the white rice.
